message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we split the difference and settle on $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
